article.title: Air Force Research Lab Awards Intelligence Technology Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ObjectVideo Incorporated, Reston, Virginia, is being awarded a $9,999,919 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for creation of an analyst tool to extract relevant information from unstructured imagery that contains little or no metadata by integrating existing computer vision and pattern matching algorithms. Air Force Research Laboratory, Rome, New York, is the contracting activity.
